abstract: Two executives are being groomed for the permanent appointment as chief, and the choice is being delayed until the end of the year.
snippet: Two executives are being groomed for the permanent appointment as chief, and the choice is being delayed until the end of the year.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  Unable to agree on a chief executive, shareholders in TNK-BP on Wednesday appointed one of the Russian co-owners as interim chief.

headline.main: Interim Chief Is Appointed at BP Venture in Russia
headline.print_headline: Interim Chief Is Appointed At BP Venture In Russia
